Note: "M 106 B2919 W1-24760/205 50 M 4/18" appears on bottom left of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that recruits are required immediately for the Women's Land Army so enrol today. Illustration shows a women with a cow, holding a bucket.
